has research problem: joint entity recognition and relation extraction

has research problem.from sentence: State-of-the-art models for joint entity recognition and relation extraction strongly rely on external natural language processing (NLP) tools such as POS (part-of-speech) taggers and dependency parsers.

has research problem: entity recognition and relation extraction simultaneously

has research problem.from sentence: In this paper, we propose a joint neural model which performs entity recognition and relation extraction simultaneously, without the need of any manually extracted features or the use of any external tool.

has research problem: joint model that performs the two tasks of entity recognition and relation extraction simultaneously, and that can handle multiple relations together.

has research problem.from sentence: In this work, we focus on a new general purpose joint model that performs the two tasks of entity recognition and relation extraction simultaneously, and that can handle multiple relations together.
